description: One-fourth the digital sum of base 5 representations of 2^n.
mathematica: a[n_] := 1/4* Module[{aux = IntegerDigits[2^(n + 1), 5]},Sum[aux[[i]], {i, 1, Length[aux]}]] [From _José María Grau Ribas_, Feb 13 2010]
author: _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jun 20 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jul 04 2000
